1.0.1.name: wordpress/platform
1.0.1.description: Platform is an drag-and-drop theme-design framework for WordPress and HTML5. It will help you do amazing things with your site, faster & easier than ever before. Designed and developed by PageLines in California. Twitter @pagelines
